column6: While grieving for the loss of friends and colleagues after a massive attack on the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, Ant-Man returns home to the small town he grew up in--where he gets into some small-time trouble with some small-time crooks.
column8: | colorist:Bill Crabtree | penciller (cover):Phil Hester | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Ande Parks | letterer:Rus Wooton
